title: Selene03
author: Selene03
created_time: February 09, 2023, 03:36:18 PMLast edit: February 13, 2023, 10:01:30 AM by Selene03
content: What happened: Herobots: Omens of Hero. These people have copied the content, art and work of another NFT game (changing their name, of course) to scam people. Their strategy is to offer you well paid jobs or collaborations and before hiring you they ask you to try their game first. They provide you with a download key to the file, which contains a trojan that infects your computer and empty your wallets. There are several threads on Twitter about it. His previous Twitter accounts were @HERO_BOTS and @HeroOmens (now suspended). Be careful!Scammers Profile Link: https://twitter.com/HerobotsOmenshttps://theherobotsplay.com/ (report the website here: https://phish.report/contacts/REG-dot-RU -thanks to Albon for the url)https://linktr.ee/herobotshttps://herobots.gitbook.io/hero.bots/introduction/herobots-omens-of-heroAnd they had Discord channel but the invitation link is not valid, if they make a new one they will put it in their Linktree.Amount Scammed: I don't have that exactly data, but quite a few wallets.Some testimonials:https://i.ibb.co/kGGtZV5/012.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/cgJY3P4/013.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/7WSqZXM/Fo-XIDb-OWYAAbqu0.png https://i.ibb.co/th6jK2d/Fo-XIH7-WXw-AAUJ9l.pngThreads:https://twitter.com/karlowrites/status/1605684546246045696?s=20&t=Zr0nURNGD7Fn1gzdWbeBUghttps://twitter.com/ghost93_x/status/1606285334727254016?s=20&t=Zr0nURNGD7Fn1gzdWbeBUghttps://twitter.com/CoinSeer/status/1615090438947446784?s=20&t=Zr0nURNGD7Fn1gzdWbeBUghttps://twitter.com/TheChild1996/status/1622270948304130048?s=20&t=Zr0nURNGD7Fn1gzdWbeBUgAmount Scammed: I don't have that exactly data, but quite a few wallets.Additional Notes: Some screenshots about their way of contacting you (mostly looking for game testers, developers and NFT artists)https://i.ibb.co/N205GjB/Fk-NKMb-Na-AAEei-E1.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/NSv74hK/Fl43198ak-AIui2-Y.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/dLRMS1M/Fo-XDv-BIXo-AAR9mf.jpghttps://i.ibb.co/ZMGvcJK/Fo-XDv-BJXo-AAb281.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/xHP06bM/Fo-XEdvd-XEAAvli8.png

comments.author: albon
comments.created_time: February 09, 2023, 06:10:58 PMLast edit: February 09, 2023, 06:30:21 PM by albon
comments.body: There is also a scam game about which a topic has been posted here in this section and its name is PlaymisteriumAnyway, thank you for alerting the community of the danger of downloading this game that contains Trojans on their devices, everyone who received a direct message from the teams of these scam projects should report their accounts and not open any links sent to them to download these harmful games.There are many victims of this game that you mentioned so we should all be more careful and I think we should report their domain please help me with that, until it gets suspended permanently.You can report the domain through the link below:[1] https://phish.report/contacts/REG-dot-RUQuoteDomain name: HEROBOTS-PLAY.COMRegistrar: Reg.ru IANA ID 1606Status: clientTransferProhibitedCreation Date: January 8, 2023Update Date: February 8, 2023 (1 day ago)Expiration Date: January 8, 2024Age:33 daysRegistrant Street: PO box 87, REG.RU Protection ServiceRegistrant City: MoscowRegistrant Postal Code: 123007Registrant Country: RURegistrant Phone: +7.4955801111Registrant Fax: +7.4955801111Registrant Email: HEROBOTS-PLAY.COM@regprivate.ruReports have been completed successfully, waiting for their responses

Thank you for your help. I have reported it, I hope there will be positive news about it.

comments.author: ScamViruS
comments.body: Quote from: Selene03 on February 09, 2023, 03:36:18 PMWhat happened: Herobots: Omens of Hero. These people have copied the content, art and work of another NFT game (changing their name, of course) to scam people. Their strategy is to offer you well paid jobs or collaborations and before hiring you they ask you to try their game first. They provide you with a download key to the file, which contains a trojan that infects your computer and empty your wallets. There are several threads on Twitter about it. His previous Twitter accounts were @HERO_BOTS and @HeroOmens (now suspended). Be careful!Scammers use this technique in many ways to scam crypto users with job offers. Nowadays one should refrain from downloading from any unknown source, because now such scams exist online. Well done by posting this scam here, those who read this thread will try to stay safe from such scams. These scammers target people who are interested in various crypto related things. So be careful to stay safe.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Now that  Metamask marked their site as a phishing site that's the end of their platform, but since this is a new way to scam people, mostly bounty hunters or testers are going to buy another domain and create the same platform, they are going to do it over again, until they scam a lot of people and the majority of people know this scheme.We have to trace these platforms and report it, I'm sure there will be other ones or more coming.

comments.author: Selene03
comments.body: Quote from: coin-investor on February 09, 2023, 11:49:06 PMNow that  Metamask marked their site as a phishing site that's the end of their platform, but since this is a new way to scam people, mostly bounty hunters or testers are going to buy another domain and create the same platform, they are going to do it over again, until they scam a lot of people and the majority of people know this scheme.We have to trace these platforms and report it, I'm sure there will be other ones or more coming.This is true. That's why they have opened a new site: https://theherobotsplay.com/ Let's report it again, they can't seem to get enough.
